origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BankAPI.get_financial_health_advice', 'description': 'This function provides financial health advice based on the capital structure data of a specified bank.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bankName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}, {'name': 'capitalStructureData', 'type': 'OBJECT', 'description': 'The capital structure data including debt ratio, equity ratio, and long-term debt to total assets ratio.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialHealthAdvice', 'description': 'The financial health advice based on the provided capital structure data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
接下来，获取中国银行的长期债务与总资产比率数据。最后，请提供一些基于资本结构分析的财务健康建议。
